name: 耿慶瑞
objective:
Electronic Commerce, also known as e-business, describes the manner in which transactions take place over networks, mostly the Internet. It is the process of electronically buying and selling goods, services, and information. EC is not just about buying and selling, it is also about electronically communicating, collaborating, and discovering information. It is about e-learning, e-government, and much more.This course will focus on B2C, C2C field.

課程重點 ：互動媒體.網路行銷策略.網路消費者行為.網路環境下,品牌,通路,產品,廣告促銷的探討.最後是顧客服務分析 課程並求學生提出網路行銷創業報告
